justifications.quorum_choice: W=2, R=2 with N=3 gives W+R=4 > 3, guaranteeing strong consistency. Every read overlaps with at least one sync-written follower, so no stale reads.
justifications.follower_count: 3 followers allows surviving floor(3/2)=1 failure while still meeting W=2 quorum. Total cost is $40/hr (4 nodes Ã— $10), well within the $50 budget.
justifications.rate_limiting: 10 requests per 60s window protects against burst traffic during flash sales while allowing normal browsing patterns (~5 req/s steady state).
justifications.auto_spawn: Enabled with 5s delay so dead followers are automatically replaced, minimizing downtime. 5s delay prevents thrashing from transient failures.
